WorkItem.Summary: Add CSS Selector Query Engine onto HTMLAgilityPack

Comments.Message: In the meantime you can use css2xpath https://bitbucket.org/MostThingsWeb/css2xpath-reloaded and attach it to HtmlAgilityPack via extension methods
